user.title: SmartThings Find login (manual)
user.description:
After logging in at [smartthingsfind.samsung.com](https://smartthingsfind.samsung.com/), open DevTools → Network and copy the whole Request Headers → `Cookie:` line from the `chkLogin.do` request.

1) Open: [smartthingsfind.samsung.com](https://smartthingsfind.samsung.com/)
2) DevTools (F12) → Network
3) Select `chkLogin.do` (refresh if needed)
4) Copy Request Headers → `Cookie:` (entire line)
5) Paste below

error.invalid_cookie: Invalid cookie format. Paste the full Request Headers → Cookie: line.
error.auth_failed: Authentication failed. Cookie expired or invalid.
